channel.title: Having trouble with my client 718/742
channel.description:
i have my server on and running ports 43594 default ip but when i go to run the client it sits at checking updates 1%
its been 5 min and hasnt moved or givin an error?
[img]http://i.imgur.com/VIJDLee.jpg[/img]
i was told before to check both revisions and make them match revision = 3 did that still gives the same error any help please?
any help?
